zh: 手里的一个朋友胜过林子里的两个！

en: He went out to eat.

zh: 我哥打算去制药厂工作。

en: I don't have time right now.

zh: 没几个学生来参加会议。

en: Although Takahashi looks completely Asian, I've heard he's of mixed blood.
zh: 虽然高桥长得完全是亚洲人样儿，但我听说他是混血。

en: Suffering from terminal cancer, he was thrown out of a certain veteran hospital in New York three times because he adamantly rejected blood transfusions.
zh: 因为患有癌症晚期，他三次被纽约的一家退伍军人医院赶了出来，就因为他坚决拒绝输血。

en: I saw Jessie standing there.
Today was the school closing ceremony for 2008.
zh: 今天是2008年的学校结业典礼。

en: Fresh-water fish include some designated as protected species. You're not allowed to catch or buy them.
zh: 淡水鱼里有些被列为了保护物种，不能抓也不能买。

en: You can add sentences that you do not know how to translate.
zh: 你可以添加你不知道怎么翻译的句子。

en: You know what my idiot son's doing? Even now he's graduated from university he spends all his time playing pachinko instead of getting a job.
zh: 你知道我那个笨蛋儿子在干嘛吗？都大学毕业了，还不去找工作，天天就知道打帕青哥。

en: He chipped the edge of the tea cup.
zh: 他把茶杯边儿磕掉了一块。

en: My older brother started to take interest in Japanese folk songs when he was around 12 years old.
zh: 我哥十二岁左右开始对日本民谣感兴趣。

en: Nope.
In Hawaii you can swim in the sea all year.
zh: 在夏威夷一年四季都能下海游泳。

en: My name is Farshad.
Is Mother scolding the horse?

zh: 如果克里奥帕特拉的鼻子塌一点，世界历史可能就改写了。

en: When I was a kid, I thought that if I died the world would just disappear. What a childish delusion! I just couldn't accept that the world could continue to exist without me.
zh: 小时候我觉得如果我死了，世界就会消失。真是幼稚的幻想！我当时就是没法接受没了我这世界还能照样转。

en: Lazarus Zamenhof is Polish.

zh: 那蛋黄酱里全是化学成分！

en: Many consumers are concerned about the health risks of genetically modified food.
zh: 很多消费者都担心转基因食品对健康的风险。

en: I was invited by an old friend.
zh: 我是一个老朋友邀请过来的。

en: Please do not kill me.
He's my younger brother.

zh: 草图画好后，用蘸水笔勾线。

en: We hope to reach the summit before it gets dark.
zh: 我们希望赶在天黑前登顶。

en: He trimmed his beard for the wedding.
zh: 他为了婚礼修了修胡子。

en: I'm scared of big, black, hairy tarantulas!
zh: 我最怕那种又大又黑长满毛的捕鸟蛛了！

en: "You're interested in this sort of thing?" "No, not really."
zh: “你对这类事感兴趣？”“不，没多大兴趣。”

en: Everybody knows the moon is made of cheese.
zh: 谁都知道月亮是奶酪做的。

en: This hamburger is inexpensive for a Japanese hamburger.
zh: 就日本汉堡而言，这个算挺便宜的了。

en: Can you give me your cell number?
Could you please tell me what your cell phone number is?
zh: 能麻烦告诉我你的手机号是多少吗？

en: Could you tell me your mobile number please?
zh: 能告诉我你的手机号吗？

en: My room number is 5.
You play Starcraft really well.

Screw you!
A cat is not human.
Cats are not human.
Dogs aren't people. First of all, remember that.
zh: 狗不是人。首先，你得记住这点。

en: I also want to know!
I'd like to turn some photos of mine into a calendar. How should I go about it?
zh: 我想把我的一些照片做成日历，该怎么弄？

en: There's no escape for her.
I saw the person I expected standing there.
zh: 我看到我要等的那个人正站在那儿。

en: What is Assembla?
The more chocolate you eat, the fatter you'll get.
zh: 巧克力吃得越多，你就越胖。

en: Spies make it their business to know things that you don't want them to know.
zh: 间谍的活儿就是打听那些你不想让他们知道的事。

en: We saw through your lies.
Please do not buy it.
Please come back next week.
I will come back next week.

en: He visited France three times.

zh: 他已经去过法国三次了。

en: Betty killed them all.
The assignment is due two weeks from today.
zh: 作业的截止日期是两周后的今天。

en: Movie theaters are losing more and more revenue due to internet piracy.
zh: 因为网络盗版，电影院的收入越来越少了。

en: We've been out of touch with each other for a long time.

zh: 魔术师请了一位观众上台配合。

en: I got to know her REAL well.
More than a third of the world population lives near a coast.
zh: 全世界超过三分之一的人口住在沿海地区。

en: We must sit down.

zh: 世界的教育水平真让我失望。

en: Isn't a problem at all, is it?

en: I don't see that there's any particular problem here, is there?
zh: 我没看出来这儿有什么特别的问题，有吗？

en: Well, then there's no problem, don't you think?
zh: 既然那样就没问题了，你不觉得吗？

en: If so, then there's no problem at all, is there?

en: If so, it shouldn't be any problem at all, should it?

en: I don't think that it's strange at all.

en: I don't think it's strange at all.

en: I was saying that I didn't think that it was weird at all.
zh: 我刚才是在说，我压根没觉得这事儿奇怪。

en: But I don't think it's strange at all.

en: But I don't think it's at all odd.

en: Well I don't think it's at all odd.

en: I don't think it's odd at all.

en: I don't think that it's odd at all.

en: I don't think that it's weird at all.

en: You don't think that that is weird at all?

en: A house that keeps out rain and dew and is impervious to heat and cold is a wonderful thing.
zh: 一间能遮风挡雨、隔绝寒暑的房子真的很棒。

en: As I'm sensitive to heat, I can't live comfortably without air-conditioning in summer.
zh: 因为我特别怕热，夏天要是没空调根本没法过。

en: He's really sensitive to heat and I'm sensitive to the cold. What should we do about our bedroom?
zh: 他特别怕热，而我特别怕冷。我们的卧室该怎么办呢？
